channel.title: [Delta] Music won't stop after logging in [Delta]
channel.description: I added music when the client starts but it keeps going even when I log in. How do I make it that it only plays the music till you log in?

item.title: [Delta] Music won't stop after logging in [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

Somewhere in the login process, you can make it so if the return code is equal to 2 (you should see like if (k == 2) or something of the sort), then stop the music.

Read full topic
item.source: [Delta] Music won't stop after logging in [Delta]
